exercises.title: Bài tập 1 — Thì và động từ (4 câu)
exercises.instructions: Chọn đáp án đúng (A, B, C hoặc D) để hoàn thành câu.

questions.question: By the time we _______ at the cinema, the film had already started.
questions.explanation: Câu dùng cấu trúc 'By the time + past simple' + mệnh đề chính ở past perfect hoặc past simple: 'By the time we arrived at the cinema, the film had already started.' 'Arrived' (past simple) là đúng.

questions.question: If she _______ harder, she would have passed the exam last month.
questions.explanation: Đây là câu điều kiện loại 3: 'If + past perfect, would have + past participle'. Do đó 'had studied' là đúng.

questions.question: He _______ in that company for five years before he resigned.
questions.explanation: Hành động hoàn tất trước một hành động quá khứ khác → dùng past perfect: 'had worked'.

questions.question: By next July, I _______ my degree.
questions.explanation: Hành động hoàn tất trước thời điểm tương lai → dùng thì tương lai hoàn thành: 'will have finished'.

exercises.title: Bài tập 2 — Từ vựng & Collocations (4 câu)
exercises.instructions: Chọn đáp án đúng (A, B, C hoặc D).

questions.question: She made a very _______ decision to quit her job and travel.
questions.explanation: 'Rash' nghĩa là vội vàng, thiếu suy nghĩ — phù hợp ngữ cảnh.

questions.question: Which word completes the collocation: 'to take _______ of'?
questions.explanation: Cụm đúng là 'take advantage of' = tận dụng.

questions.question: Pick the best synonym for 'reluctant'.
questions.explanation: 'Reluctant' = miễn cưỡng → đồng nghĩa với 'hesitant'.

questions.question: He gave a very _______ explanation, so everyone understood the problem.
questions.explanation: Ngữ cảnh chỉ ra lời giải thích dễ hiểu → 'clear' là đúng.

exercises.title: Bài tập 3 — Đọc hiểu ngắn (4 câu)
exercises.instructions: Đọc đoạn văn và chọn đáp án đúng.
exercises.passage: Tom started his new job in August. He found the work challenging but enjoyable. After three months, he got a promotion and his responsibilities increased. Although the extra duties were stressful at first, Tom felt proud of his progress.

questions.question: When did Tom start his new job?
questions.explanation: Đoạn văn ghi rõ: 'Tom started his new job in August.'

questions.question: How did Tom feel about the extra duties at first?
questions.explanation: Câu trong đoạn: 'Although the extra duties were stressful at first...' → 'stressed'.

questions.question: What happened to Tom after three months?
questions.explanation: 'After three months, he got a promotion' → anh ấy được thăng chức.

questions.question: Overall, Tom's attitude toward his progress is best described as:
questions.explanation: Câu cuối: 'Tom felt proud of his progress.' → 'proud'.

exercises.title: Bài tập 4 — Câu bị động & Mệnh đề quan hệ (4 câu)
exercises.instructions: Chọn đáp án đúng (A, B, C hoặc D).

questions.question: The novel _______ wrote was adapted into a film last year.
questions.explanation: Mệnh đề quan hệ chỉ vật → dùng 'which' hoặc 'that'. Ở đây 'that' là đúng: 'The novel that he wrote...'.

questions.question: The instructions _______ were given to all participants.
questions.explanation: Thể bị động quá khứ đơn: 'were read'.

questions.question: This is the house _______ was built in 1890.
questions.explanation: 'Which' thay cho vật trong mệnh đề quan hệ chủ động/bị động: 'the house which was built...'.

questions.question: A decision ___________ yesterday surprised everyone.
questions.explanation: Cụm phân từ quá khứ rút gọn: 'A decision made by the committee...'.

exercises.title: Bài tập 5 — Phrasal verbs, Prepositions và Ngữ pháp nâng cao (4 câu)
exercises.instructions: Chọn đáp án đúng (A, B, C hoặc D).

questions.question: She _______ up smoking last year and feels much healthier now.
questions.explanation: 'Give up' = từ bỏ (thói quen).

questions.question: I'm looking forward _______ you at the conference next month.
questions.explanation: 'Look forward to' + V-ing → 'to meeting you'.

questions.question: They insisted _______ paying for the meal even though we offered.
questions.explanation: 'Insist on doing something' là cấu trúc đúng.

questions.question: Had I known about the traffic, I _______ earlier.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 3 đảo ngữ → 'Had I known..., I would have left...'.
